WRITING.TEXT: Hey guys, which profession should I level up to level 100? I play on Echo and I'm a returning player
I've just started playing and I'm looking for the best profession to level :)
I have about 40mk so I'm looking to invest some of it into a profession which is worth it :)
Great thank you, I'll give it a go :)
If you could please thatd be great help
Thanks guys, I have another question. I really want to build a nice Eca character but I have no idea what build to go for because this class has changed quite a lot since I last played, any advice?

WRITING.TEXT: Hey guys, could someone recommend a good build for eca? Not sure how to build one these days

Thanks for your help!

Thanks guys I'm gonna try some of these out! I'm aiming for level 30 today then I think I might go to meriana gargoyle cave and do task there for stone golems, thornbacks and gargoyles :) I forgot to mention I have around 4kk to spend on the character and have already invested in soft boots and exercise wands to get my mlvl to 55. I have yeah :/ gonna remove everything and try again now I suppose
Thanks man! I've tried that too and that's when it gets stuck on 56% :/ literally no idea what to do

WRITING.TEXT: I have a 135 cra, I have scrolled agi, str and int and have no idea which build to go for! I've just returned to the game so not sure what works well now, ideally I'd like to go for 2 builds like int/cha or something (I can scroll cha to 100). Looking mainly at pvm but would like to play some 3v3 kolo too. I have around 27mk to spend. Also when building a mono or omni character is it better to go for a pure power set or elemental? Hope this all makes sense I've never been that familiar with dofus terms haha.

WRITING.TITLE: Temporis IV - English speakers
WRITING.TEXT: Looking for some English speakers or guilds on Temporis IV, bit lonely at the moment haha
Cant add you for some reason bro Add me: Jesparuri
I'm gonna start on X tomorrow if you're up for it?

I came back to Dofus after a break and I have a 140 cra on Echo, there are a lot of mono accounts but it's still super easy to find people who play on their own and have fun so you really dont have to change server unless you wanna start from scratch.

WRITING.TITLE: Returning player looking for team
WRITING.TEXT: I have a 30 MS on Antica and I'm looking for people who are just starting or are a similar level to team up with :) Sonny Donny is my name

WRITING.TITLE: Huppert Build 15x
WRITING.TEXT: Hey guys, just wondering what a good build for Hupper is past lvl 150? I'm looking at pvm mainly with the occasional 3v3 kolo. I'd like to have 12 ap and 6mp I already have a mp/AP gelano, ap shield and will be using limbo wand. If you can give me some advice on a pure build or mono it would be great! Have about 30mk to spend btw
Thanks that's very helpful! I dont speak French but it's fairly easy to work out :D I might go for the multi build tbh

WRITING.TITLE: Quests
WRITING.TEXT: So I'm a level 152 cra and I wanna do some quests, j havent played this game in a long time and never actually got round to do any quests. Which ones would you guys reccomend at my level? I recently did the Otomai Questline for the nice ornament so what other ones are worth doing?
Thanks a lot! Btw if I'm a higher level can I still pick up for example a lvl 20 quest that I missed?

WRITING.TITLE: Single Account Servers
WRITING.TEXT: I want to start playing on one of the single account servers (no idea what they're called haha) which of them has the biggest english speaking and lower lvl community?
How about Ily, worth starting there?
I've just popped onto both of the servers and it appears the whole community is french speaking xd
Sure no problem! What's your name?

WRITING.TITLE: Ilyzaelle - New player
WRITING.TEXT: Hey guys, just wanted to see if there is an English speaking guild that would take on a returning player! I've decided to go for this server rather than the newer one because I have some ogrines I will trade for kamas to give myself a better start but I need some people to play with! :)

Definitely Stonerefiners, not only is it easy exp for a paladin using stealth rings but with it being double loot you can make some good money as they drop creature products and platinum coins. If you're looking to make some money then start at swamp trolls, they drop medicine pouches which sell for around 3k on the market (at least on Antica).

WRITING.TITLE: Int Iop 100 Set
WRITING.TEXT: Hi guys, could someone recommend a good set for a 100 Int Iop? I'm looking for PvM so nicely balanced vitality and damage. Items I already own: Mp/AP Gelano Shaker AP shield DT - vit, int and power My budget for the rest is around 2mk (the cheaper the better of course) Thanks for your help!
I dont, however it is something I could buy it just means an extra 1mk to the budget. Is nomad vital at that level?

If you're just starting then people usually say that Iop and Cra are the easiest. Cra being a ranged class and Iop closer combat. What I would say is have a look at each class, see what spells they have and just go for the one you think youd have the most fun with :)
Yeah sure thing! Which server do you play on?
Oh I play on Ilyzaelle! It's a lot better because it only allows one account per person so there is a lot more people to play with even at lower levels :)
My name is Sonny-Boy :)

WRITING.TITLE: Int / Agi Cra set
WRITING.TEXT: I'm currently a lvl 95 agi cra but I'm looking to go int agi around 105 when I can get limbo wand. It's mainly for pvm and I need some set ideas, I've tried dofus fashionista but to be honest I don't like the sets it gives me. I have scrolled both agi and int so is it a good idea having 200 in each (100 scrolled and 100 extra) and then just adding a few items which give int and agi and going for power as well? I'm really bad when it comes to building dual element sets so hoping someone can help me! Looking to spend around 4mk I have an ap shield, shaker ready for 100 and also an ap/mp gelano.
Thanks a lot man! That's what a lot of people have told me, to go omni later on. I might switch to yours int because of the explosive arrow!
I'm thinking about switching to pure int too man! Explosive arrow can be cast twice right? Just not on the same target?
Awesome! I'm gonna do the same haha

WRITING.TITLE: Elio
WRITING.TEXT: Any Elio on Ily that would be kind enough to show me how to place portals in the dojo? I've watched videos, looked online and I just cant seem to get it. I recently switched to Elio yesterday so it's only been one day but every time I get into a pvp fight I just end up getting stuck because I dont know what I'm doing haha. Would be much appreciated.

A lot of people who are high levels with unlimited funds will create new characters to go into lower lvl kolo. Unfortunately because of this it's very hard to get a 'fair' fight because like you mentioned someone who is the same level as you or even lower will more than likely be a lot more powerful because of their stupidly strong gear for their lvl. If I were you I'd just keep grinding away and enjoy the pvm side of the game, that's what I've been doing because kolo especially at lower levels is extremely frustrating.
https://www.gamosaurus.com/jeux/dofus/dofus-guides-de-stuff Its in French but can translate! I've been using it to build my sets.
Does dofusbook give build ideas for certain levels? I didnt know.

WRITING.TITLE: Login queue
WRITING.TEXT: Is anyone else struggling to log onto Ilyzaelle? It says there is a queue of 1080 people and then I get a caution and it doesnt seem to go down, not sure if it's an issue on my side?

WRITING.TITLE: Getting bored
WRITING.TEXT: I came back to Dofus recently and I was having fun, doing some quests I've never done before etc and now I've reached lvl 105 on my INT cra and I'm just bored again. I've taken a few breaks from Dofus before and I think for me it's the fact I never have a clue on how to make kamas which would then allow me to have fun with my character, experiment with different builds, do pvp etc. What would you guys suggest that I do in order to make the game more interesting? I really just want to grind a profession that will eventually start making me a lot of money in the game but I never know where to start. I play on Ily and please dont suggest quests and achievements because I know they give you some okay kamas but I've been doing those for about 3 weeks straight now and just want something else.

Int cra is extremely good at solo especially once you unlock explosive arrow, fights are over extremely quickly and you basically dont lose any hp if you play it right. If you wanna go cra go agi until you unlock explosive!

WRITING.TITLE: Client very laggy
WRITING.TEXT: Recently the client has been very laggy for me, the worst part is that it does make a difference restarting it however because I play on Ily it means I always end up getting stuck in a queue. I've got it on the lowest settings but it's still bad, it might be my PC however it's only started happening recently. Is there anything specific I should tick off in the settings that you guys have done and has made a difference? Thank you in advance!
Thanks for the tip!

WRITING.TITLE: Nice mount 400k
WRITING.TEXT: Yo guys, could someone recommend a nice looking mount that's up to 400k? I recently returned to tibia and I'm a 38 ek so looking for one thats quite easy to obtain (in a zone that I can go to). Can be expensive as I'm looking for something, let's say that not everybody has. Currently riding a donkey
Wow thanks a lot, that mount looks great! Definitely gonna give it a go
Atm I have the warrior with the sword but I'm planning on completing it at some point so the deer might look nice with it, thank you!

Agi cra is good at pvp around that lvl. You've got plaguing arrow which doesnt require line of sight, retreat which of course gives you that pushback, magic arrow to steal range and of course absorptive arrow for that life steal! The sets are fairly cheap as well because you can rock a today set with mad tofu cloak and then fill the rest with whatever you want. The one set I'd stay away from if you want to do just kolo is the normal blop pieces because you will have -resistance in one of the elements which can be unfortunate. Because your budget is 2km you can get some vit maged items too just to give you more of a survival chance. Good luck!

WRITING.TITLE: Charm points
WRITING.TEXT: So I'm a returning player and I have a 97 RP. One thing I want to understand is the charm system, from my understanding you get charm points for fully unlocking a creature or getting a certain amount of kills right? My big question is: should I start farming charm points on lower lvl creatures to gain them quicker or is it just better to pick them up as I hunt along the way? Also what charms are good to get on RP? (Off topic question: any English speaking guilds recruiting on Antica? #128513;) Thank you in advance!

I see! So for my lvl if I dont have charms I'm not gonna be at a big disadvantage? Also my fully unlocking do you mean the loot? Because for example I checked and I killed over 600 frost dragons but the loot is still unlocked because of how bad the drops are from them.
Cool! So there is no point in just purely focusing kn farming charm at my lvl? Lvl as normal so that I can have a base to go back to should I want to

WRITING.TITLE: The better the weather, the longer the queues?
WRITING.TEXT: I live in the UK and the weather has been great recently, the only problem is that playing Dofus is becoming a challenge because whenever I want to log on in the afternoon the queues are ridiculous. I play on Ily, does anyone know if Ankama are doing anything about this or if it's just one of those things I'm gonna have to get used to? I never remember Dofus being this busy and I cant actually remember waiting in a queue with over 1800 people.

WRITING.TITLE: Fifa - boring
WRITING.TEXT: Yo guys, I have been playing fifa for a long time now and for me this one has been a disgrace. From the start of it, the career mode was an absolute joke with the league table issue I still cant believe they got away with charging the full price for such a broken game. Then we had and still have the ultimate difficulty, how has that not been fixed yet it's been months!! For me I get so bored of career mode and I salute the ones who actually go past even the first season because for me I just find it so boring and repetitive, not only that but playing on Legendary becomes far too easy and I've tried to mess about with the sliders but then a few games in it becomes super easy again, switching to ultimate just isnt an option because of how broken it is. What's your opinion on this years career mode? Is there someone that actually works on career? Because it honestly doesnt feel like it. Are you as disgusted as me at the fact that these people at EA get away with this shit year in year out just because us fifa players want to play a decent football game and there isnt exactly much competition out there. Would love to hear others opinions because I just cant believe how bad this game is.

This is the thing, there are so many simple features they could add that would make it a bit more fun and realistic but they're just a bunch of lazy (not even gonna say it) when it comes to career mode.
How is it good??

You must have really low expectations if you think this game is good, they have a lot of good features which are ruined by the god awful and unrealistic gameplay. The fact that the ultimate difficulty has been broken for months and still not fixed is disgusting.

WRITING.TITLE: Cha/Str Cra
WRITING.TEXT: I have a 110 cra and I've been playing omni just for fun but I wanna narrow it down to just 2 elements and I'm thinking cha/str for pvp? I had a cha/str cra just over a year ago before I quit dofus and I had a lot of fun with it in kolo but dunno if it's still any good? I am scrolled in both stats and currently working towards a crimson. I know people say go single element until higher lvls but tbh with you I find playing one element very boring. If anyone has a set I could wear that would also he very helpful! (currently without a crimson but do have an ap/mp gelano, shaker, nomad and ap shield) Thank you in advance.
Could I ask you what server you play on? Looking for a decent one myself :)

WRITING.TITLE: Sea Serpent profit (RP
WRITING.TEXT: So I recently returned to Tibia and I have a 99 RP. One of the spawns I've watched videos on is the Sea Serpent one which I did the quest for (absolute pain) and the exp there is great however I'm really struggling to make any profit. I tend to waste a lot of potions because they always get me in a group. I have the critical strike imbuement on my warsinger bow (I'm a total noob when it comes to this) but I dont know what I can do to start profiting there? My dist is 94 with equipment!

WRITING.TITLE: Bleeding heart ornament
WRITING.TEXT: How do I get the Bleeding Heart Ornament? I'm currently a lvl 20 brak and I've just done the quest 'Apprenticeship: Disciple of Djaul'. Sorry I can't find any information on this hopefully someone can help :)
Is he in the Brak Tower?

WRITING.TITLE: Hupper 130 gear
WRITING.TEXT: Could someone reccommend me a good set for lvl 130 int/str hupper? Have crimson, mp ap gelano, limbo wand, ap shield and shaker so just need the rest! It's mainly for pvm but wouldnt mind doing some 3v3 kolo too. Thank you!

The thing is I'm not trying to rush through the game, which is why I'm looking for a set for my current level. I know that people say stay mono until level 15x but I find a mono build especially on hupper very boring.
Thanks for the advice anyway! I'll definitely go omni at 150 with the gear that's available, just looking for something str int for now.

WRITING.TITLE: Career Mode - What can I do? (FIFA 20)
WRITING.TEXT: [photo2](https://ibb.co/qyHmVJ9)[photo1](https://ibb.co/b18x5v5) So after a month of not playing career mode I decided to have a go today. I picked the ultimate difficulty with Cutzy sliders and lost 6-0, I think I managed to have one shot and they absolutely battered me. I then downgraded to Legendary and as you can see I dont think I've ever played an easier game of fifa, I was literally just walking through their defence. I've played fifa for a good few years now and I've never stopped playing career mode this soon and it's simply for the fact that there seems to be 0 balance when it comes to the difficulty? Legendary has never been this easy and Ultimate is just ridiculous. How can I make Legendary more challenging? Does anyone have any enjoyable sliders?
Congrats!! This is probably a really stupid question but I recently came back to Tibia and I how how it runs and looks, how can I change it to your setup?

I feel your pain. I've seen people on here saying they've been using different sliders put out by youtubers out there, I've tried them all and tweaked them as much as possible but I still find this game unplayable. Ultimate for me no matter what sliders you use is just completely unrealistic because all the players seem to have the same maxed out stats, the gameplay just feels shocking. On legendary I find that you might get the sliders right for a game or two but then it becomes extremely easy again because again it just feels like the players cpu stats are bad? I got to the point today where I was literally changing the cpu stats every goal I scored or every 10 mins because it was so easy to play against. I salute people who are enjoying career mode still but for me it's just too broken. Its crazy how EA have gotten away with first of all releasing a broken game with all the bugs in career mode to then breaking it even more with patches and just leaving it. I think football manager is the way to go, no way anyone should ever give another penny to EA because all they care about is the income from ultimate team.

WRITING.TITLE: Omni Ecafilip
WRITING.TEXT: Yo, I'm playing a strength eca currently and was just wondering if an omni eca works around lvl 160? I'm trying to make it a bit more fun but no idea if its viable at all. Anyone playing omni?
Do you think its worth going omni at that lvl? I see a lot of people saying omni is terrible these days unless you're lvl 200
I'll give it a go then!
Lmao they couldn't even be bothered to give him long hair, cba with EA anymore

WRITING.TITLE: Need Idol Tips
WRITING.TEXT: I'm playing as a lvl 160 omni eca (mainly pvm) and I'm looking to start farming mobs solo with idols, not too bothered about the experience but more about making kama. I've never actually used idols in Dofus and I've only seen people that I've hunted with use them so I'm completely new to this, could someone recommend me some idols that I can use? The great thing about my build is I can choose whether to keep my distance or fight close up, having said that I'm looking for idols within my budget of around 2.5mk, I recently bought my omni set so a bit low on kamas atm. Appreciate any help!
Thank you! Is it just the normal dynamo and yosh or major?
Got ya, thanks a lot for your help!
Will give it a go thank you!!

Mainly because of the fact if you play it well you wont get hit and once you unlock explosive arrow you can kill multiple mobs in one go, this makes it very efficient because if you're farming mobs for kama you want the fights to be quick.

Hi welcome! Which server you playing on? As a new player I'd I'd you check out Benjamight he is currently making videos for people new to Dofus which will give you some insight the different classes and how they work! https://youtu.be/KUlKgkCtVKI Other than that I'd just say pick the class which you most like the look of and go for it!
Usually people go agi because of the great gear you can get at the start then switch to int once they get explosive arrow

Well Jahash is the newest mono account server so if you're looking for a bit more of a challenge then that's the one. I play on Ily and its great, I started here last month and there are always people doing quests and stuff together whether you're a low, mid or high lvl. Quite a few guild are recruiting all the time too so you can always join one of them to start with!

Hi what lvl are you? I'm currently using a 156 omni cra and it's really good for pvm! You can find the classic omni set on this forum, I'd post it in here but it wont let me copy it on my phone for some reason! Just put 'omni' in the search bar at the top! Huppermage and Foggernaut are also good omni pvm classes but cra is of course the easiest to play.
Nice! Btw do Atleti always make the champions league final lmao? I've seen so many people play against them

I feel your pain, I've levelled my professions but I find farming the resources so boring because of all the campers. I started doing treasure hunts and would highly recommend them. It's not exactly passive income because obviously you have to run around a little but using https://dofus-map.com/en/hunt you can easily find the clues. 10 of those and you're looking at around 100kk but bare in mind the fact that you can sometimes get lucky and get the rose of sands multiplied by 10 or very rarely 100 which is the jackpot. Treasure chests also can drop you scales and map fragments which can sell for around 500kk. What I like to do is run my treasure hunts and just collect all the resources I find for extra kama, also always have some empty soul stones on you because you will encounter some archies at some point.

Yo I recently came back to Dofus on Echo and managed to find a guild straightaway and people to play with. I found it quite boring in the following days because of course people play on multi accounts there so even though you will find someone to help you out it's hard to actually find someone to play with. I was in a similar position because I have a lvl 150 on Echo with tons of living objects and stuff I didnt want to lose but decided to move to Ily and start from scratch. It's definitely something I would recommend, there are a lot of returning players with lower lvls so you will always find people to play with, there is also a great English speaking community If you have time on your hands then I say go for it and eventually you will make enough kama to buy yourself any living objects you like using! Good luck!
No worries! If you have any questions then message me in game Sonny-Boy, can always run you through some of the starting dungeons to get you started!

WRITING.TITLE: Fifa Legendary Sliders (Looking for tips)
WRITING.TEXT: Hi guys, I recently came back to Fifa. I left when they made ultimate basically impossible haha. I've been using legendary and without sliders it's far too easy, no challenge at all and 0 realism. I adjusted the sliders and it is somewhat realistic, when they attack it's difficult to defend against which is great. The issue I'm having is that when I attack its still very easy for me to just dribble past everyone and theh dont put enough pressure on me. I also manage to get to every ball before them even though I've adjusted the sliders to make it as challenging as possible. Does anyone have any really difficult legendary sliders they use for 6 mins half? I dont know what I can change to make them press me more and make them better at tackling. Thanks!
Where can I find those?
Thanks I'll give those a go. On first glance they look a little bit too easy though.

I think the best thing to do is to just give it a shot and see what you think for yourself! I recently came back but I find myself distanced from the game and I cant get 'addicted' again (last time I played was around 8.1) and I think the main reason i feel like this towards it is the so called pay to win side of it, exp boosts and being able to stack up on runes and potions for real money so that you can just powergame the shit out of it. Having said that it doesnt mean you have to spend money to enjoy the game because the big positive now is that its definitely easier to make money and lvl so that you could even grind yourself to premium and whatever else you might want to buy from the store which back in the day was virtually impossible. There are also a lot of new features which make the game interesting to play so my advice is just to give it a shot because we all have different opinions and expectations. Good luck!
How much money do people actually throw at this game? Considering all those shit outfits you can buy are like 25 euros each lmao

WRITING.TITLE: Mafia 2 - Definitive Edition
WRITING.TEXT: I bought the Mafia 2 game with all the DLCs because I loved this game when I was younger! I'm doing the main storyline now and with this edition I get the 3 extra storylines that I can do after, are they all worth doing? I'm talking about the Jimmy Vendetta one and the 2 others cant remember the names. Also with this DLC are there any new outfits I'll be able to purchase? I'm on chapter 4 atm and it's still the same ones I can remember when I had the normal version, I've noticed I have the outfit from Mafia 3 in the wardrobe and a new car in the garage but that's about it. Thank you!

WRITING.TITLE: Elio INT set 12x
WRITING.TEXT: Could someone recommend a good set for a lvl 121 INT Elio, I do pvm and also a bit of kolo. I already have shaker, crimson dofus ap/mp gelano and limbo wand just not sure to go for with other items go get good int but also some nice res. My budget is around 5mk Thanks for your help.
Ty mate! Just gotta level up a little bit then :)

WRITING.TITLE: Server Recommendation
WRITING.TEXT: I have a lvl 100 on Antica which I'm extremely bored of playing. Long story short a friend of mine quit the game some time ago and left me all of his money and gear which means I've been able to pretty much buy anything I wanted and this is how I got bored of the game. I want to start from scratch and grind the game but I dont know which of the newer worlds to go for. Could someone recommend a new-ish server which isnt going to die out any time soon with an active English community and maybe even other returning players starting again? Thank you for any help!
Thanks I just had a look and there are already lvls 700+ there I'm looking for something newer
Thanks everyone for the replies, I've decided to go with Damora and if anyone is looking to play together feel free to add me Wavey Shoota!

I just find the pay to win side of Tibia very boring, if you have money which was given to you and not earned then I dont think you can experience the game properly. I'm gonna throw it back and start with nothing and just grind my way towards gear/addons etc like the good old days haha. I'm not looking to giveaway any of my stuff on Antica simply because I might return there one day who knows haha.
I have actually found some good ones, these definitely make legendary more challenging and realistic. Hope they work for you! https://youtu.be/nssn2eKVCsQ

WRITING.TITLE: How to bounce back after hack
WRITING.TEXT: Hi everyone, I have a lvl 66 druid on Antica and unfortunately a few years ago I was hacked. At that time my friend who quit tibia left me his fortune which was around 200cc and I had some decent equipment like Soft Boots etc. I decided to give Tibia a shot again and I just need some advice on what I can do to bounce back, how can I make some money as a druid and get myself some decent equipment to start with. I've bought premium account but I dont want to spend any more real money on the game, so buying TC and selling them for kk isnt an option. Thanks for any useful advice!
Is there a guide anywhere? I'm not too aware of what tibia is like now
That's a real shame, I only enjoy playing as a mage I'm not a fan of paladin or knight :/
What are you talking about?
That's very helpful thanks!
Very helpful thank you!

Wow a lot of comments to reply to, thank you for all the advice I'll definitely be taking it on board. I'm seeing a lot of 'buy tibia coins' comments. The problem is I'm already thinking about spending money on premium again so add tibia coins to that and I've spent #163;20. It's not that I wouldnt spend it on a game I love im just trying to avoid pay 2 win now and looking to get back into Tibia to see if I would even enjoy it, which is why I wouldnt mind a little bit of a grind I dont see why that's so hard to understand haha.
Appreciate it bro - Valthin

WRITING.TITLE: Better teams easy to play against
WRITING.TEXT: So I recently found some sliders which make legendary a lot more difficult and fun. I'm playing as Valencia and just to give you an example one of my recent games was against Mallorca where I really had to grind to get a result, which is great. The game that followed this one was against Barcelona and for some reason they were very easy to play against, I mean I could dribble past every single one of their players without a problem and they were very easy to defend against, Messi was non existent. Does this happen to anyone else where the better teams are just so much easier to play against? By adjusting the sliders did I somehow break the game haha? Surely not right, the fact that the sliders make the CPU a lot better should mean that teams like Barcelona are extremely difficult to play against which just isnt the case. This really does take away from the fun and realism, not to mention the fact they had Seamus Coleman playing at right back.

WRITING.TITLE: Could someone explain to me how this was given as an own goal haha. Man this game is broken isnt it.

WRITING.TEXT: I didn't say they were pressing us the whole game did I? But they caused us problems by pressing us just like most teams have done over the past few weeks
I get that but what the lack of fight today was unacceptable, Leicester probably can't wait for Sunday now.
Teams are most dangerous when that happens yeah and what do we have that gives us confidence going into sunday.
We clearly watched a different game then? They didn't even have to sit back because at no point did we take the game to them, West Ham looked comfortable.
Yeah you're right I just came on here for the shits and giggles. This is coming from a man who says west ham sat back the whole game #128557;

I don't know what you class as sitting back then? Because we edged possession and in terms of shots we were pretty much equal. In regards to the press what I'm saying is they caused us problems when they pressed us which youre right didn't happen too often but when it did we struggled to play out the back just like we did against Southampton and Chelsea which is why I said it was worrying, I wasn't just talking about this game in isolation but in recent weeks this is something that we have struggled with and it needs to be worked on.
Definitely, they look up and there's no option so they pass it back to De Gea who most of the time boots it to no one, its something we need to work on.

I think the guy is just knackered at this point especially considering he had a long term injury and he's played a lot of football recently. I did think he was frustrating today because he tried to take people on all the time and it just wasn't working out, I love the fact that he's direct but he should have switched it up today.

WRITING.TITLE: Victor Lindelof
WRITING.TEXT: Put some respect on that man's name, quality today!! Criticised all season (unfairly a lot of the times) but big performance from him today and have to give credit where its due

Yeah I think it was just a challenge he had to make because he committed, just like Maguire and Williams! And definitely, just wanted to show some appreciation for him because he's often the scapegoat!

I really don't think you read what I said, I gave him praise today because he's always the one who gets criticised in our back four. Also nobody says he's class, if anything the opposite. He's a ball playing centre back and the physical one beside him should be Harry Maguire who also has mistakes in him but doesn't get half of the criticism that Lindelof does. Both need to improve a lot.

I simply wanted to give him praise because he's been criticised a lot more than any of our defensive players (apart from Luke Shaw). All of our defenders still have to improve a lot if we're gonna go to the next level in the coming season.

WRITING.TITLE: Fearing my appointment
WRITING.TEXT: So I have an appointment scheduled tomorrow, essentially I had a fractured tooth which I neglected for a long time due to my fear of the dentist and didn't end up getting it fixed until it started really hurting (I know that's bad) this was around 6 months ago. So he fixed that tooth for me and another one which was a smaller filling and despite 2 injections I still felt a lot of pain, is this normal? I'm going tomorrow because the tooth that was fixed has been playing up recently, there is still a kind of hole on the side of it which was left and it does hurt when I bite down but nothing too major. I also have an abcess on the other side of my mouth under a different tooth which again isn't too painful but I want to have it sorted before it gets worse, so I don't make the same mistakes this time round. I just want to ask what sort of treatment can I expect especially to get rid of the abcess because I've never had that before. And also why is it that after a couple of injections I feel that my mouth is numb but I still feel pain, this happened on my last visit and the one before which was at a different practice but I feel like this doesn't help my fear of the dentist haha.

Thank you for your answer! This is the thing, last 2 times I went I had 2 injections on both occasions and still felt a lot of pain, the dentist then just said when it gets too much just put your hand up and we'll stop and then go again. Am I within my right to say I won't continue until I'm completely numb?

WRITING.TITLE: Travel to Italy
WRITING.TEXT: Hi guys, I'm not sure if this is the right forum but I have a question regarding travelling to Italy. I'm due to fly out on Monday and I'm going for 11 days, i received an email about 'mandatory travel documentation' from RyanAir and it's just a list of countries with links to a form. This form includes a lot of things about where I'll be self isolating for 14 days, the purpose of my 'essential' travel etc. I'm actually only going to see my girlfriend so I have no idea if I need to fill out this form? Because it sounds like it's a form that would be required should Italy go into lockdown again and got rid of the air bridge between the UK and Italy. Just wanna know if anyone has travelled to Italy recently and if they had to fill out this form? It might be me being an idiot and not understanding the email haha

Thanks for the info! The thing with that form is it asks me where ill be staying for 14 days (I'm only there for 11) and reason for my stay which isn't exactly essential im just visiting my girlfriend, she went last month and didn't have to fill out any forms.

Yeah I just checked it out and it basically says that from the 9th of July you have to fill out the form which you linked in the first post, on that form you have to declare that you will be self isolating at an address for 14 days. Another plot twist comes just below that information as it says that 'passengers travelling from this list of countries (includes the UK)' will not be required to self isolate. This is why I'm so confused
Yeah thats the website I was going off!

Mad how at the start the tables were completely unrealistic and ai would play their reserves against you so then they 'fixed' it by making it the complete opposite, basically impossible to win the league when you're playing on higher difficulty or with more difficult sliders. Are they capable of fixing anything without completely fucking it up?

WRITING.TITLE: Seen a lot of great goals here but let's appreciate this tackle in the 90th minute 3-2 up.

WRITING.TEXT: Haha yes mate quality goal #128526;
It hits differently
Fun team to play with and a great stadium. Shame they haven't got more scanned faces #128566;
What difficulty is that?
By squad player thats what I meant, I'm just talking at home every now and then I dont see why we wouldn't be able to play all 4 of them.
So he will be a squad player then haha. A squad player just means someone who isn't always part of the starting 11.

WRITING.TITLE: Expect a new signing now...
WRITING.TEXT: You just know that they're going to announce Telles on Monday or Tuesday now, the way this club is run is beyond a joke at this point but we all know this already, where do we actually go from here when another one of our managers is about to be hung out to dry. I dont want to overreact after one result but it was blatant to see at the end of last season where we needed to strengthen and so far we've added a great player in Van de Beek but arguably in a position where we didn't need to strengthen - a centre back, right winger and a defensive midfielder should have been our priorities. It's just heartbreaking to see this club being run so so poorly.
Yeah but central midfield wasn't a priority thats my point
We needed depth yes but the priority was at least 2 first team players which should have been a centre back and a winger

Yeah Van de Beek will play most games but he's still a squad player only because Bruno and Pogba are ahead of him and he isnt really a defensive midfielder, I love him as a player and a squad llayer these days plays 20+ games a season anyway but we had to get a centre back or right winger in first, like you said Lindelof and Maguire are as bad as each other haha
Yeah it's gone past blaming managers now when its clear that they're never backed! I think you can question Ole today though, Dan James in a game like this was never gonna work

Yes thats exactly what I'm saying though haha everyone seems to have a different definition of a 'squad player' to me it just means he isnt ahead of Pogba and Bruno therefore he will come in instead of one of them or off the bench, he isnt a starting eleven player unless Ole changes the formation to one with an extra midfielder. The priority was a STARTING right winger or centre back

Thats true it wouldn't shock me if he sneaks into the starting eleven if Pogba doesn't start performing better! For sure, I cant bare to watch Dan James suffer anymore and I say suffer because I feel sorry for him he clearly isn't good enough to be starting
I think it's time to up that difficulty bud
I am absolutely sick to death of Maguire pretending he can play the ball out of the back and constantly losing it, all the way up the pitch sometimes and then just jogging back...

WRITING.TITLE: Returning player - Server recommendations
WRITING.TEXT: Hey guys, I want to come back to Tibia after a long break and I'm not sure which server to pick? Ideally I'd like to start on one thats fairly new-ish, with an active English speaking community and possibly one where you can still find ppl to hunt with at lower lvls. I want to play as sorc and would love it if someone had any tips on how to best start as a mage, how can I make a little bit of money at the start etc.

Wow thank you very much! I didnt know about all those items that drop from low lvl creatures, I'm glad that's the case because I really can't afford to grind like I used to so making some quick money at the start is very appealing :)
Mata is such a smooth footballer!

WRITING.TITLE: Monza?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi guys, I wanna come back to Tibia but I cant be bothered with skilling! There is an auction for a lvl 8 paladin with 100+ dist on the server Monza and im just wondering what that server is like especially for a returning player? I have only ever played on Antica so don't want to buy a character and it turns out the server isn't great haha
